         <li id="cite_note-57"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-57" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Gansser, A. 1964. <i>Geology of the Himalayas</i>, John Wiley Interscience, London, 1964 289 pp.</span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-58"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-58" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFRosenberg" class="citation web cs1">Rosenberg, Matt. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://geology.about.com/library/bl/peaks/bleverest.htm">"A site which uses this dramatic fact first used in illustration of "deep time" in John McPhee's book <i>Basin and Range</i>"</a>. Geology.about.com<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">17 June</span> 2016</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&rft.genre=unknown&rft.btitle=A+site+which+uses+this+dramatic+fact+first+used+in+illustration+of+%22deep+time%22+in+John+McPhee%27s+book+Basin+and+Range&rft.pub=Geology.about.com&rft.aulast=Rosenberg&rft.aufirst=Matt&rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fgeology.about.com%2Flibrary%2Fbl%2Fpeaks%2Fbleverest.htm&rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMount+Everest" class="Z3988"></span></span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-MyrowOthers2009-59"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-MyrowOthers2009_59-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-MyrowOthers2009_59-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-MyrowOthers2009_59-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Myrow, P.M., N.C. Hughes, M.P. Searle, C.M. Fanning, S.-C. Peng, and S.K. Parcha, 2009, "Stratigraphic correlation of Cambrian Ordovician deposits along the Himalaya: Implications for the age and nature of rocks in the Mount Everest region". <i>Geological Society of America Bulletin</i>. v. 121, no. 3–4, pp. 323–332.</span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-Searle1999a-60"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Searle1999a_60-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Searle, M.P. (1999) <i>Emplacement of Himalayan leucogranites by magma injection along giant sill complexes: examples from the Cho Oyu, Gyachung Kang and Everest leucogranites (Nepal Himalaya)</i>. Journal of Asian Earth Sciences. v. 17, no. 5–6, pp. 773–783.</span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-GuoOthers2012-61"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-GuoOthers2012_61-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Guo, Z., and M. Wilson (2012) <i>The Himalayan leucogranites: Constraints on the nature of their crustal source region and geodynamic setting.</i> Gondwana Research. v. 22, no. 2, pp. 360–376.</span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-pbs_nature-62"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-pbs_nature_62-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"> 

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.pbs.org/wnet/nature/the-himalayas-tectonic-motion-making-the-himalayas/6342/">"Tectonic Motion: Making the Himalayas"</a>. <i>Nature on PBS</i>. 11 February 2011<span class="reference-accessdate">.          <li id="cite_note-USGS-63"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-USGS_63-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"> 

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://pubs.usgs.gov/gip/dynamic/himalaya.html">"The Himalayas: Two continents collide"</a>.          <li id="cite_note-64"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-64" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.columbia.edu/cu/pr/95/18688.html">"Press Release: An Earth Plate Is Breaking in Two"</a>. <i>www.columbia.edu</i>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&rft.genre=unknown&rft.jtitle=www.columbia.edu&rft.atitle=Press+Release%3A+An+Earth+Plate+Is+Breaking+in+Two&rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.columbia.edu%2Fcu%2Fpr%2F95%2F18688.html&rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMount+Everest" class="Z3988"></span></span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-MyrowOthers2003a-65"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-MyrowOthers2003a_65-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Myrow, P.M., N.C.          <li id="cite_note-MyrowOthers2012a-66"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-MyrowOthers2012a_66-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Myrow, P.M., N.C.          <li id="cite_note-Searle2012a-67"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Searle2012a_67-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Searle, M. 2012. <i>Colliding Continents: A geological exploration of the Himalaya, Karakoram, & Tibet.</i> Oxford University Press, Oxford. 464 pp. 

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><a href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a> <a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-0-19-965300-3" title="Special:BookSources/978-0-19-965300-3">978-0-19-965300-3</a></span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-plants-68"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-plants_68-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-plants_68-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20120425233903/http://www.adventureandscience.org/high-plants.html">"High altitude plants"</a>. <i>Adventure Scientists</i>.          <li id="cite_note-autumn-69"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-autumn_69-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-autumn_69-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-autumn_69-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-autumn_69-3"><sup><i><b>d</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-autumn_69-4"><sup><i><b>e</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFAnn_Heinrichs2009" class="citation book cs1">Ann Heinrichs (2009). <span class="cs1-lock-registration" title="Free registration required"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://archive.org/details/mounteverest0000hein"><i>Mount Everest</i></a></span>.          <li id="cite_note-70"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-70" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation news cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.bbc.com/news/science-environment-61828753">"Nepal to move Everest base camp from melting glacier"</a>. <i>BBC News</i>. 17 June 2022<span class="reference-accessdate">.          <li id="cite_note-82"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-82" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFWest1999" class="citation journal cs1">West, John B. (1 March 1999). "Barometric pressures on Mt. Everest: new data and physiological significance". <i>Journal of Applied Physiology</i>. <b>86</b> (3): 1062–1066. <a href="/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1152%2Fjappl.1999.86.3.1062">10.1152/jappl.1999.86.3.1062</a>. <a href="/wiki/PMID_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="PMID (identifier)">PMID</a> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/10066724">10066724</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&rft.genre=article&rft.jtitle=Journal+of+Applied+Physiology&rft.atitle=Barometric+pressures+on+Mt.+Everest%3A+new+data+and+physiological+significance&rft.volume=86&rft.issue=3&rft.pages=1062-1066&rft.date=1999-03-01&rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1152%2Fjappl.1999.86.3.1062&rft_id=info%3Apmid%2F10066724&rft.aulast=West&rft.aufirst=John+B.&rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMount+Everest" class="Z3988"></span></span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-83"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-83" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20120715023449/http://www.cfcenter.co.il/dsinfo.htm">"The Dead Sea Region as a Health Resort"</a>. The CF Center. Archived from <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.cfcenter.co.il/dsinfo.htm">the original</a> on 15 July 2012<span class="reference-accessdate">.          <li id="cite_note-Basilevsky2003-84"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Basilevsky2003_84-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFBasilevskyHead2003" class="citation journal cs1">Basilevsky, Alexandr T.; Head, James W.          <li id="cite_note-uiaa-85"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-uiaa_85-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-uiaa_85-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-uiaa_85-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20090105213822/http://www.theuiaa.org/news_86_Everest-weather-station-goes-online">"Everest weather station goes online"</a>.          <li id="cite_note-wind-98"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-wind_98-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-wind_98-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20160901215435/http://www.accuweather.com/en/weather-news/window-of-opportunity-everest/64450">"Window of Opportunity: Everest Climbing Season Underway"</a>. <i>Accuweather</i>. Archived from <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.accuweather.com/en/weather-news/window-of-opportunity-everest/64450">the original</a> on 1 September 2016<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">23 January</span> 2014</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&rft.genre=unknown&rft.jtitle=Accuweather&rft.atitle=Window+of+Opportunity%3A+Everest+Climbing+Season+Underway&rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.accuweather.com%2Fen%2Fweather-news%2Fwindow-of-opportunity-everest%2F64450&rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMount+Everest" class="Z3988"></span></span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-alanarnette.com-99"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-alanarnette.com_99-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.alanarnette.com/blog/2014/02/20/everest-numbers-latest-summit-stats/">"Everest by the Numbers: The Latest Summit Stats"</a> <span class="cs1-format">(Blog)</span>. <i>alanarnette.com</i><span class="reference-accessdate">.          <li id="cite_note-100"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-100" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFPagnamenta" class="citation news cs1">Pagnamenta, Robin. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/mt-tenzing-and-mt-hillary-nepal-honours-everest-pioneers-lhvhzpssmj6">"Mt Tenzing and Mt Hillary: Nepal honours Everest pioneers"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/The_Times" title="The Times">The Times</a></i>. <a href="/wiki/ISSN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISSN (identifier)">ISSN</a> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.worldcat.org/issn/0140-0460">0140-0460</a><span class="reference-accessdate">.          <li id="cite_note-swiss-115"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-swiss_115-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-swiss_115-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.everesthistory.com/climbers/schmied.htm">"Ernst Schmied"</a>.          <li id="cite_note-116"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-116" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.everesthistory.com/climbers/whittaker.htm">"Jim Whittaker"</a>. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">13 February</span> 2010</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&rft.genre=unknown&rft.btitle=Jim+Whittaker&rft.pub=EverestHistory.com&rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.everesthistory.com%2Fclimbers%2Fwhittaker.htm&rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMount+Everest" class="Z3988"></span></span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-test-117"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-test_117-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFIsserman2007" class="citation journal cs1">Isserman, Maurice (February–March 2007). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20081203164307/http://www.americanheritage.com/articles/magazine/ah/2007/1/2007_1_58.shtml">"Highest Adventure"</a>. <i>American Heritage</i>.          <li id="cite_note-FOOTNOTEUnsworth2000594-118"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FOOTNOTEUnsworth2000594_118-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="#CITEREFUnsworth2000">Unsworth (2000)</a>, p. 594.</span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-119"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-119" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.himalayanclub.org/hj/">"The HJ/31/8 THE JAPANESE MOUNT EVEREST EXPEDITION, 1969-1970"</a>. <i>The HJ/31/8 THE JAPANESE MOUNT EVEREST EXPEDITION, 1969-1970</i>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&rft.genre=unknown&rft.jtitle=The+HJ%2F31%2F8+THE+JAPANESE+MOUNT+EVEREST+EXPEDITION%2C+1969-1970&rft.atitle=The+HJ%2F31%2F8+THE+JAPANESE+MOUNT+EVEREST+EXPEDITION%2C+1969-1970&rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.himalayanclub.org%2Fhj%2F&rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMount+Everest" class="Z3988"></span></span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-120"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-120" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20091014112932/http://www.everesthistory.com/everestsummits/summits70.htm">"Everest Summits in the 1970s"</a>. <i>EverestHistory.com</i>.            <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://blog.theclymb.com/passions/history-2/ice-warriors-polands-golden-alpine-generation/">"The Ice Warriors: Poland's Golden Alpine Generation"</a>. 30 March 2016.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&rft.genre=unknown&rft.btitle=The+Ice+Warriors%3A+Poland%27s+Golden+Alpine+Generation&rft.date=2016-03-30&rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fblog.theclymb.com%2Fpassions%2Fhistory-2%2Fice-warriors-polands-golden-alpine-generation%2F&rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMount+Everest" class="Z3988"></span></span> </li>

         <li id="cite_note-Washington_Post-130"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Washington_Post_130-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFBaechtel" class="citation news cs1">Baechtel, Mark. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/archive/entertainment/books/2001/11/18/for-anyone-with-even-a-passing/a4f154e5-c22b-4fc9-bea3-93c794d34814/">"Review: Above the Clouds: The Diaries of a High-Altitude Mountaineer"</a>. <i>Washington Post</i>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&rft.genre=article&rft.jtitle=Washington+Post&rft.atitle=Review%3A+Above+the+Clouds%3A+The+Diaries+of+a+High-Altitude+Mountaineer&rft.aulast=Baechtel&rft.aufirst=Mark&rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.washingtonpost.com%2Farchive%2Fentertainment%2Fbooks%2F2001%2F11%2F18%2Ffor-anyone-with-even-a-passing%2Fa4f154e5-c22b-4fc9-bea3-93c794d34814%2F&rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMount+Everest" class="Z3988"></span></span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-Russia_Beyond-131"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Russia_Beyond_131-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Russia_Beyond_131-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFZubacheva2018" class="citation web cs1">Zubacheva, Ksenia (21 February 2018). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.rbth.com/history/327642-boukreev-everest-tragedy">"How a Russian rescued U.S. alpinists on top of Mt.          <li id="cite_note-New_York_Times_Review_The_Climb-132"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-New_York_Times_Review_The_Climb_132-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFParfit1997" class="citation news cs1">Parfit, Michael (7 December 1997). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://archive.nytimes.com/www.nytimes.com/books/97/12/07/reviews/971207.07parfitt.html">"Breathless"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/New_York_Times" class="mw-redirect" title="New York Times">New York Times</a></i>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&rft.genre=article&rft.jtitle=New+York+Times&rft.atitle=Breathless&rft.date=1997-12-07&rft.aulast=Parfit&rft.aufirst=Michael&rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Farchive.nytimes.com%2Fwww.nytimes.com%2Fbooks%2F97%2F12%2F07%2Freviews%2F971207.07parfitt.html&rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMount+Everest" class="Z3988"></span></span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-NewScientist-133"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-NewScientist_133-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation journal cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20070703183045/http://www.newscientisttech.com/article/mg18224492.200-the-day-the-sky-fell-on-everest.html">"The day the sky fell on Everest"</a>. <i>New Scientist</i> (2449): 15. 29 May 2004. Archived from <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.newscientisttech.com/article/mg18224492.200-the-day-the-sky-fell-on-everest.html">the original</a> on 3 July 2007<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">11 December</span> 2006</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&rft.genre=article&rft.jtitle=New+Scientist&rft.atitle=The+day+the+sky+fell+on+Everest&rft.issue=2449&rft.pages=15&rft.date=2004-05-29&rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.newscientisttech.com%2Farticle%2Fmg18224492.200-the-day-the-sky-fell-on-everest.html&rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMount+Everest" class="Z3988"></span></span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-BioEd_Online-134"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-BioEd_Online_134-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFPeplow2004" class="citation web cs1">Peplow, Mark (25 May 2004). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.bioedonline.org/news/news.cfm?art=986">"High winds suck oxygen from Everest. Predicting pressure lows could protect climbers"</a>. BioEd Online<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">11 December</span> 2006</span>. <q>Moore explains that these jet streaks can drag a huge draught of air up the side of the mountain, lowering the air pressure. He calculates that this typically reduces the partial pressure of oxygen in the air by about 6%, which translates to a 14% reduction in oxygen uptake for the climbers. Air at that altitude already contains only one third as much oxygen as sea-level air.</q></cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&rft.genre=unknown&rft.btitle=High+winds+suck+oxygen+from+Everest.+Predicting+pressure+lows+could+protect+climbers&rft.pub=BioEd+Online&rft.date=2004-05-25&rft.aulast=Peplow&rft.aufirst=Mark&rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.bioedonline.org%2Fnews%2Fnews.cfm%3Fart%3D986&rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMount+Everest" class="Z3988"></span></span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-badassoftheweek.com-135"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-badassoftheweek.com_135-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-badassoftheweek.com_135-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.badassoftheweek.com/weathers.html">"Beck Weathers"</a>. <i>Badass of the Week</i>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&rft.genre=unknown&rft.jtitle=Badass+of+the+Week&rft.atitle=Beck+Weathers&rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.badassoftheweek.com%2Fweathers.html&rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMount+Everest" class="Z3988"></span></span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-DMag-136"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-DMag_136-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-DMag_136-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-DMag_136-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFWeathers2000" class="citation journal cs1">Weathers, Beck (May 2000). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.dmagazine.com/publications/d-magazine/2000/may/my-journey-home-from-everest/">"My Journey Home From Everest"</a>. <i>D Magazine</i><span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">31 January</span> 2017</span>. <q>They left me alone in <a href="/wiki/Scott_Fischer" title="Scott Fischer">Scott Fischer</a>'s tent that night, expecting me to die. On a couple of occasions, I heard the others referring to 'a dead guy' in the tent. Who could that be? I wondered as I slipped in and out of wakefulness.</q></cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&rft.genre=article&rft.jtitle=D+Magazine&rft.atitle=My+Journey+Home+From+Everest&rft.date=2000-05&rft.aulast=Weathers&rft.aufirst=Beck&rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.dmagazine.com%2Fpublications%2Fd-magazine%2F2000%2Fmay%2Fmy-journey-home-from-everest%2F&rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMount+Everest" class="Z3988"></span></span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-Baltasar-137"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Baltasar_137-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFHopewell2013" class="citation news cs1">Hopewell, John (6 August 2013). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://variety.com/2013/film/international/2-guns-kormakur-set-to-climb-everest-1200574821/">"<span class="cs1-kern-left"></span>'2 Guns' Helmer Kormakur Set to Climb 'Everest'<span class="cs1-kern-right"></span>"</a>. <i>Variety</i><span class="reference-accessdate">.            <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFD._SavageB._Torgler2015" class="citation book cs1">D. Savage; B.          <li id="cite_note-151"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-151" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.tribuneindia.com/2006/20061210/spectrum/main6.htm">"The High and Low of Everest"</a>.          <li id="cite_note-152"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-152" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.explorersweb.com/everest_k2/news.php?id=7925">"Everest K2 News ExplorersWeb – Un-named Everest Sherpa gets a name – and fatality details"</a>. <i>explorersweb.com</i><span class="reference-accessdate">.          <li id="cite_note-153"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-153" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://old.seattletimes.com/html/outdoors/2003127747_webeverest16.html">"Outdoors: David Sharp's vow on Everest: 'If I don't do it this time, I'm not coming back.'<span class="cs1-kern-right"></span>"</a>. <i>The Seattle Times</i><span class="reference-accessdate">.          <li id="cite_note-britb-154"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-britb_154-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.bbc.com/future/story/20151008-the-graveyard-in-the-clouds-everests-200-dead-bodies">"Death in the Clouds: The problem with Everest's 200+ bodies"</a><span class="reference-accessdate">.            <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFSquires" class="citation news cs1">Squires, Nick. <span class="cs1-lock-subscription" title="Paid subscription required"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/worldnews/asia/nepal/1519597/Climber-declared-dead-on-Everest-is-brought-down-alive.html">"Climber declared dead on Everest is brought down alive"</a></span>. <i>Daily Telegraph</i>.            <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.alanarnette.com/blog/2018/05/24/everest-2018-season-summary-record-weather-record-summits/">"Everest 2018: Season Summary – Record Weather, Record Summits"</a>. <i>The Blog on alanarnette.com</i>. 25 May 2018<span class="reference-accessdate">.          <li id="cite_note-time5604758-163"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-time5604758_163-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-time5604758_163-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-time5604758_163-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-time5604758_163-3"><sup><i><b>d</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-time5604758_163-4"><sup><i><b>e</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-time5604758_163-5"><sup><i><b>f</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-time5604758_163-6"><sup><i><b>g</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">

         <li id="cite_note-NG_-_Maxed_Out_on_Everest-164"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-NG_-_Maxed_Out_on_Everest_164-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://ngm.nationalgeographic.com/2013/06/125-everest-maxed-out/jenkins-text">"Everest Maxed Out"</a>. ngm.nationalgeographic.com<span class="reference-accessdate">.          <li id="cite_note-alanarnette-165"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-alanarnette_165-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.alanarnette.com/blog/2013/06/03/everest-2013-season-recap/">"Everest 2013: Season Recap: Summits, Records and Fights"</a>. <i>alanarnette.com</i><span class="reference-accessdate">.          <li id="cite_note-alanarnette2-166"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-alanarnette2_166-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.alanarnette.com/blog/2014/06/09/everest-2014-season-summary-nepal-tragedy/">"Everest 2014: Season Summary – A Nepal Tragedy"</a>. <i>alanarnette.com</i><span class="reference-accessdate">.          <li id="cite_note-washingtonpost-167"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-washingtonpost_167-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFPeter_Holley2016" class="citation news cs1">Peter Holley (12 January 2016). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/worldviews/wp/2016/01/12/for-the-first-time-in-42-years-nobody-made-it-to-the-top-of-mount-everest-last-year/">"For the first time in four decades, nobody made it to the top of Mount Everest last year"</a>. <i>The Washington Post</i><span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">29 May</span> 2016</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&rft.genre=article&rft.jtitle=The+Washington+Post&rft.atitle=For+the+first+time+in+four+decades%2C+nobody+made+it+to+the+top+of+Mount+Everest+last+year&rft.date=2016-01-12&rft.au=Peter+Holley&rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.washingtonpost.com%2Fnews%2Fworldviews%2Fwp%2F2016%2F01%2F12%2Ffor-the-first-time-in-42-years-nobody-made-it-to-the-top-of-mount-everest-last-year%2F&rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMount+Everest" class="Z3988"></span></span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-168"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-168" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.alanarnette.com/blog/2016/12/30/everest-by-the-numbers-2017-edition/">"Everest by the Numbers: 2017 Edition"</a>. <i>alanarnette.com</i>. 30 December 2016<span class="reference-accessdate">.          <li id="cite_note-telegraph.co.uk1-169"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-telegraph.co.uk1_169-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-telegraph.co.uk1_169-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFParker2018" class="citation news cs1">Parker, Simon (4 April 2018). <span class="cs1-lock-subscription" title="Paid subscription required"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.telegraph.co.uk/travel/comment/should-we-stop-climbing-everest/">"Is it time to ban Western travellers – and their egos – from Mount Everest?"</a></span>. <i>The Telegraph</i>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://ghostarchive.org/archive/20220110/https://www.telegraph.co.uk/travel/comment/should-we-stop-climbing-everest/">Archived</a> from the original on 10 January 2022.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&rft.genre=article&rft.jtitle=The+Telegraph&rft.atitle=Is+it+time+to+ban+Western+travellers+%E2%80%93+and+their+egos+%E2%80%93+from+Mount+Everest%3F&rft.date=2018-04-04&rft.aulast=Parker&rft.aufirst=Simon&rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.telegraph.co.uk%2Ftravel%2Fcomment%2Fshould-we-stop-climbing-everest%2F&rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMount+Everest" class="Z3988"></span></span> </li>

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFKrakauer2014" class="citation news cs1">Krakauer, Jon (21 April 2014). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.newyorker.com/online/blogs/newsdesk/2014/04/everest-sherpas-death-and-anger.html">"Death and Anger on Everest"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/The_New_Yorker" title="The New Yorker">The New Yorker</a></i><span class="reference-accessdate">.            <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation magazine cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://news.nationalgeographic.com/2015/04/150425-everest-earthquake-basecamp-nepal-himalaya-climbing-sherpa/">"Everest Base Camp a 'War Zone' After Earthquake Triggers Avalanches"</a>. <i>National Geographic</i><span class="reference-accessdate">.          <li id="cite_note-182"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-182" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation news cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/2015/04/25/cfa47ee6-eb95-11e4-9a6a-c1ab95a0600b_story.html?hpid=z2">"10 confirmed dead in Mount Everest avalanche, but toll expected to rise"</a>. <i>The Washington Post</i>. 25 April 2015<span class="reference-accessdate">.          <li id="cite_note-183"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-183" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://snowbrains.com/everest-will-not-be-climbed-for-first-time-since-1974/">"Mt. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">20 September</span> 2015</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&rft.genre=unknown&rft.jtitle=snowbrains.com&rft.atitle=Mt.+Everest+Will+Not+Be+Climbed+for+First+Time+Since+1974&rft.date=2015-05-05&rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fsnowbrains.com%2Feverest-will-not-be-climbed-for-first-time-since-1974%2F&rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMount+Everest" class="Z3988"></span></span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-WillEverest-184"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-WillEverest_184-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFParker2015" class="citation web cs1">Parker, Laura (13 May 2015). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://news.nationalgeographic.com/2015/05/150513-everest-climbing-nepal-earthquake-avalanche-sherpas/">"Will Everest's Climbing Circus Slow Down After Disasters?"</a>. <i>news.nationalgeographic.com</i>. <a href="/wiki/National_Geographic" title="National Geographic">National Geographic</a><span class="reference-accessdate">.          <li id="cite_note-185"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-185" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://snowbrains.com/no-one-will-climb-everest-this-year/">"No One Will Climb Everest This Year – The Last Team Pulls Out"</a> <span class="cs1-format">(Blog)</span>. <i>snowbrains.com</i>. 2 May 2015<span class="reference-accessdate">.          <li id="cite_note-200"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-200" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFPokhrel2017" class="citation news cs1">Pokhrel, Rajan (27 May 2017). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://thehimalayantimes.com/nepal/kami-rita-sherpa-scales-mt-everest-21-times/">"Kami Rita Sherpa scales Mt Everest 21 times"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/The_Himalayan_Times" title="The Himalayan Times">The Himalayan Times</a></i><span class="reference-accessdate">.          <li id="cite_note-201"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-201" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFPTI2017" class="citation news cs1">PTI (27 May 2017). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.thehindu.com/news/international/nepalese-sherpa-scales-everest-for-record-21-times/article18589634.ece">"Nepalese Sherpa scales Everest for record 21 times"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/The_Hindu" title="The Hindu">The Hindu</a></i><span class="reference-accessdate">.          <li id="cite_note-202"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-202" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFMettler2017" class="citation news cs1">Mettler, Katie (1 May 2017). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/morning-mix/wp/2017/05/01/ueli-steck-famed-swiss-mountain-climber-dead-after-plunging-3280-feet-near-mt-everest/">"Ueli Steck, famed Swiss mountain climber, dead after plunging 3,280 feet near Mount Everest"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/Washington_Post" class="mw-redirect" title="Washington Post">Washington Post</a></i><span class="reference-accessdate">.            <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.abc.net.au/news/2017-05-22/mount-everest-hillary-step-collapses/8546086">"Mount Everest's famed Hillary Step collapses"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/ABC_Online" class="mw-redirect" title="ABC Online">ABC Online</a></i>. <a href="/wiki/ABC_News_(Australia)" title="ABC News (Australia)">ABC News</a>. 22 May 2017<span class="reference-accessdate">.            <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://coloradosun.com/2019/06/06/peter-lowry-colorado-mount-everest-deaths/">"Colorado climber stepped over newly dead bodies to summit Everest.          <li id="cite_note-auto6-215"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-auto6_215-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-auto6_215-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.alanarnette.com/blog/2019/01/06/2018-19-winter-climbs-k2-climbers-en-route-nanga-climbers-climbing/">"2018/19 Winter Climbs: K2 Climbers en route, Nanga Climbers Climbing, New Everest Route?"</a>. <i>The Blog on alanarnette.com</i>. 7 January 2019<span class="reference-accessdate">.          <li id="cite_note-216"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-216" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFWallen2019" class="citation news cs1">Wallen, Joe (9 April 2019). <span class="cs1-lock-subscription" title="Paid subscription required"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2019/04/09/nepalese-team-measure-mount-everest-amid-concerns-peak-has-shrunk/">"Nepalese team to measure Mount Everest amid concerns it has shrunk following earthquake"</a></span>. <i>The Telegraph</i>. <a href="/wiki/ISSN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISSN (identifier)">ISSN</a> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.worldcat.org/issn/0307-1235">0307-1235</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://ghostarchive.org/archive/20220110/https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2019/04/09/nepalese-team-measure-mount-everest-amid-concerns-peak-has-shrunk/">Archived</a> from the original on 10 January 2022<span class="reference-accessdate">.          <li id="cite_note-217"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-217" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation magazine cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://time.com/5566400/nepalese-climbers-remeasuring-everest/">"Nepalese Climbers to Remeasure Mount Everest"</a>. <i>Time</i><span class="reference-accessdate">.            <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/world/2019/05/29/mount-everest-deaths-traffic-jam-blame-why-such-deadly-season/1258092001/">"What's causing Mount Everest's deadly season?            <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.nationalgeographic.com/adventure/2020/03/will-coronavirus-shut-down-everest/">"COVID-19 shuts down Everest"</a>. <i>Adventure</i>. 13 March 2020<span class="reference-accessdate">.            <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFCluff2022" class="citation web cs1">Cluff, Jilli (12 May 2022). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://gearjunkie.com/climbing/full-circle-everest-all-black-summit">"Mt.          <li id="cite_note-233"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-233" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.mounteverest.net/expguide/route.htm">"The route – climbers guide to Everest"</a>. <i>www.mounteverest.net</i><span class="reference-accessdate">.          <li id="cite_note-ekantipur1-234"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-ekantipur1_234-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-ekantipur1_234-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFSangam_Prasain" class="citation web cs1">Sangam Prasain. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://kathmandupost.ekantipur.com/news/2016-02-20/everest-permits-to-be-extended.html">"Kathmandu Post- Everest permits to be extended"</a>. Kathmandupost.ekantipur.com<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">17 June</span> 2016</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&rft.genre=unknown&rft.btitle=Kathmandu+Post-+Everest+permits+to+be+extended&rft.pub=Kathmandupost.ekantipur.com&rft.au=Sangam+Prasain&rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fkathmandupost.ekantipur.com%2Fnews%2F2016-02-20%2Feverest-permits-to-be-extended.html&rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMount+Everest" class="Z3988"></span></span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-kathmandupost.ekantipur.com-235"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-kathmandupost.ekantipur.com_235-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-kathmandupost.ekantipur.com_235-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://kathmandupost.ekantipur.com/news/2017-05-11/everest-expeditions-likely-to-be-delayed-by-bad-weather.html">"Everest expeditions likely to be delayed by bad weather"</a>. <i>ekantipur.com</i><span class="reference-accessdate">.            <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFTeam_Everest_03" class="citation web cs1">Team Everest 03. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20100211140355/http://www.teameverest03.org/everest_info/index.html">"Mt.          <li id="cite_note-Acclimatization-250"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Acclimatization_250-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFMuza,_SRFulco,_CSCymerman,_A2004" class="citation journal cs1">Muza, SR; Fulco, CS; Cymerman, A (2004). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20090423042451/http://archive.rubicon-foundation.org/7616">"Altitude Acclimatization Guide"</a>. <i>US Army Research Inst.          <li id="cite_note-nova-climb-251"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-nova-climb_251-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-nova-climb_251-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-nova-climb_251-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.pbs.org/wgbh/nova/everest/climb/waytosummitsou.html">"The Way to the Summit"</a>. <i>NOVA Online</i>. Public Broadcasting Corporation. 2000<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">28 March</span> 2008</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&rft.genre=unknown&rft.jtitle=NOVA+Online&rft.atitle=The+Way+to+the+Summit&rft.date=2000&rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.pbs.org%2Fwgbh%2Fnova%2Feverest%2Fclimb%2Fwaytosummitsou.html&rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMount+Everest" class="Z3988"></span></span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-252"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-252" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFVajpai2010" class="citation book cs1">Vajpai, Arjun (10 November 2010). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=qJjIBFOMsQsC&q=hillary+step&pg=PT111"><i>On Top of World: My Everest Adventure</i></a>. Penguin UK. <a href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a> <a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-81-8475-304-2" title="Special:BookSources/978-81-8475-304-2"><bdi>978-81-8475-304-2</bdi></a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&rft.genre=book&rft.btitle=On+Top+of+World%3A+My+Everest+Adventure&rft.pub=Penguin+UK&rft.date=2010-11-10&rft.isbn=978-81-8475-304-2&rft.aulast=Vajpai&rft.aufirst=Arjun&rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com%2Fbooks%3Fid%3DqJjIBFOMsQsC%26q%3Dhillary%2Bstep%26pg%3DPT111&rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMount+Everest" class="Z3988"></span></span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-253"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-253" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20160116101043/http://www.affimer.org/hemmleb7.html">"Chinese ladder"</a>.            <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFLevett2006" class="citation news cs1">Levett, Connie (3 June 2006). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.theage.com.au/news/world/the-deadly-business-of-climbing-everest/2006/06/02/1148956544080.html?page=fullpage#contentSwap2">"The deadly business of climbing Everest"</a>. <i>The Age</i>.          <li id="cite_note-265"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-265" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFFirthZhengWindsorSutherland2008" class="citation journal cs1">Firth, P.G; Zheng, H; Windsor, J.          <li id="cite_note-266"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-266" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.climbing.com/climber/climbing-everest-who-makes-it-to-the-top/">"Climbing Everest: Who Makes It to the Top?"</a>. <i>Climbing</i>. 23 November 2009<span class="reference-accessdate">.          <li id="cite_note-atlan-267"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-atlan_267-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFSvati_Kirsten_Narula2014" class="citation web cs1">Svati Kirsten Narula (21 April 2014). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/international/archive/2014/04/mortality-on-mount-everest/360927/">"Charting Deaths on Mount Everest"</a>. <i>The Atlantic</i><span class="reference-accessdate">.          <li id="cite_note-Everest_Base_Jumper-268"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Everest_Base_Jumper_268-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Everest_Base_Jumper_268-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.redbull.com/us/en/adventure/stories/1331647282718/watch-a-record-setting-base-jump-from-mt-everest">"Everest Base Jumper"</a>. Red Bull.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&rft.genre=unknown&rft.btitle=Everest+Base+Jumper&rft.pub=Red+Bull&rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.redbull.com%2Fus%2Fen%2Fadventure%2Fstories%2F1331647282718%2Fwatch-a-record-setting-base-jump-from-mt-everest&rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMount+Everest" class="Z3988"></span></span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-safer-269"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-safer_269-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-safer_269-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20150923175946/http://mentalfloss.com/article/30757/5-mountains-deadlier-everest">"5 Mountains Deadlier Than Everest"</a>. <i>Mental Floss</i>.            <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFGarner1998" class="citation news cs1">Garner, Dwight (August 1998). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20000303032319/http://www.salon.com/wlust/feature/1998/08/cov_03feature3.html">"Coming Down"</a>. <i>Salon</i>. p. 3.          <li id="cite_note-The_Climb-284"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-The_Climb_284-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFBoukreevDeWalt1998" class="citation book cs1">Boukreev, Anatoli; DeWalt, Weston (1998). <a href="/wiki/The_Climb_(book)" title="The Climb (book)"><i>The Climb</i></a>.          <li id="cite_note-altitude-285"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-altitude_285-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-altitude_285-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-altitude_285-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.boulderweekly.com/article-8924-this-is-your-brain-this-is-your-brain-at-altitude.html">"This is your brain. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">20 September</span> 2015</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&rft.genre=unknown&rft.jtitle=Boulder+Weekly&rft.atitle=This+is+your+brain.+This+is+your+brain+at+altitude&rft.date=2012-06-14&rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.boulderweekly.com%2Farticle-8924-this-is-your-brain-this-is-your-brain-at-altitude.html&rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMount+Everest" class="Z3988"></span></span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-fall-286"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-fall_286-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-fall_286-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20150721191741/http://www.ekantipur.com/the-kathmandu-post/2010/10/22/money/first-everest-ascent-in-autumn-in-10-yrs/214039/">"The Kathmandu Post :: Read the Post.            <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFFröhlich2018" class="citation web cs1 cs1-prop-foreign-lang-source">Fröhlich, Helena (14 September 2018). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://tirol.orf.at/v2/news/stories/2933228/">"Der vergessene Everest-Solist"</a> (in German). <a href="/wiki/ORF_(broadcaster)" title="ORF (broadcaster)">ORF</a><span class="reference-accessdate">.          <li id="cite_note-Starr,_Daniel-300"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Starr,_Daniel_300-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFStarr,_Daniel2011" class="citation web cs1">Starr, Daniel (18 March 2011). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.alpinist.com/doc/web11w/wfeature-polish-winter">"Golden Decade: The Birth of 8000m Winter Climbing"</a>. <i>Alpinist.com</i><span class="reference-accessdate">.          <li id="cite_note-Mt_Everest_History_and_facts-301"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Mt_Everest_History_and_facts_301-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/19990508005314/http://www.mnteverest.net/history.html">"Mt Everest History and facts"</a>. <i>Mnteverest.net</i>. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">17 June</span> 2016</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&rft.genre=unknown&rft.jtitle=Mnteverest.net&rft.atitle=Mt+Everest+History+and+facts&rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.mnteverest.net%2Fhistory.html&rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMount+Everest" class="Z3988"></span></span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-302"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-302" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFWest1985" class="citation book cs1">West, John B. (1985). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=nmfxsroNQ70C&pg=PA184"><i>Everest: The Testing Place</i></a>.          <li id="cite_note-A_view_from_the_top_of_the_world-303"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-A_view_from_the_top_of_the_world_303-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-A_view_from_the_top_of_the_world_303-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-A_view_from_the_top_of_the_world_303-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation news cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/scotland/highlands_and_islands/6334653.stm">"A view from the top of the world"</a>. <i>BBC News</i>. 15 February 2007<span class="reference-accessdate">.            <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFO'Neil2013" class="citation web cs1">O'Neil, Devon (14 November 2013). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://espn.go.com/espnw/athletes-life/article/9966961/espnw-melissa-arnot-conquered-mount-everest-five-times-american-hailed-hero-playing-peacemaker-mountain-slopes">"espnW – Melissa Arnot has conquered Mount Everest five times, but American is hailed as hero for playing peacemaker on mountain's slopes"</a>.            <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFFeeds2017" class="citation web cs1">Feeds, IANS (27 May 2017). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.india.com/news/agencies/nepals-kami-rita-becomes-third-person-to-scale-mt-everest-21-times-2176292/">"Nepal's Kami Rita becomes third person to scale Mt.          <li id="cite_note-319"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-319" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.deccanchronicle.com/lifestyle/viral-and-trending/270517/nepalese-creates-record-by-scaling-mount-everest-21-times.html">"Nepalese creates record by scaling Mount Everest 21 times"</a>. <i>deccanchronicle.com</i>. 27 May 2017<span class="reference-accessdate">.          <li id="cite_note-balloon-334"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-balloon_334-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-balloon_334-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/2014-12-03/a-hot-air-balloon-ride-over-mt-everest-will-cost-you-2-6-million.html">"A Hot-Air Balloon Ride Over Mt.          <li id="cite_note-elson-335"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-elson_335-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-elson_335-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-elson_335-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20160304030458/http://www.andyelson.com/Everest.htm">"Andy Elson goes over the top"</a>. <i>andyelson.com</i>. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">20 September</span> 2015</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&rft.genre=unknown&rft.jtitle=andyelson.com&rft.atitle=Andy+Elson+goes+over+the+top&rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.andyelson.com%2FEverest.htm&rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMount+Everest" class="Z3988"></span></span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-336"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-336" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation news cs1"><span class="cs1-lock-subscription" title="Paid subscription required"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/worldnews/5886994/Spectacular-panorama-captured-of-the-Himalayas-from-hot-air-balloon.html">"Spectacular panorama captured of the Himalayas from hot air balloon"</a></span>. <i>Telegraph.co.uk</i>. 22 July 2009. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://ghostarchive.org/archive/20220110/https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/worldnews/5886994/Spectacular-panorama-captured-of-the-Himalayas-from-hot-air-balloon.html">Archived</a> from the original on 10 January 2022<span class="reference-accessdate">.            <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20160706033814/http://www-t.nationalgeographic.com/adventure/0510/0509/whats_new/helicopter_everest.html">"Landing on Air"</a>.            <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20081202045947/http://records.fai.org/rotorcraft/history.asp?id1=112&id2=80&id3=1&id4=2">"Rotorcraft World Records"</a>.            <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20160902225132/http://blogs.dw.com/adventuresports/2016/04/23/helicopter-transport-flights-to-everest-high-camps/">"Helicopter transport flights to Everest high camps – Mount Everest"</a>.            <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.himalayas-trekking-pictures.com/everest9.htm">"Gorak Shep to Everest Base Camp and return"</a>. <i>www.himalayas-trekking-pictures.com</i>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&rft.genre=unknown&rft.jtitle=www.himalayas-trekking-pictures.com&rft.atitle=Gorak+Shep+to+Everest+Base+Camp+and+return&rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.himalayas-trekking-pictures.com%2Feverest9.htm&rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMount+Everest" class="Z3988"></span></span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-349"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-349" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFStall1985" class="citation journal cs1">Stall, Bill (2 May 1985). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://articles.latimes.com/1985-05-02/news/mn-20109_1_climbed-mt-everest">"Conquers Mt.          <li id="cite_note-heraldsun.com.au-350"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-heraldsun.com.au_350-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-heraldsun.com.au_350-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-heraldsun.com.au_350-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-heraldsun.com.au_350-3"><sup><i><b>d</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-heraldsun.com.au_350-4"><sup><i><b>e</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><span class="cs1-lock-subscription" title="Paid subscription required"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.heraldsun.com.au/news/mt-everest-summit-fever-why-climbers-make-poor-decisions-near-peak/news-story/3502b64dc81a65fec0466bf1983efff5">"Mt Everest 'summit fever': Why climbers make poor decisions near peak"</a></span>. <i>Herald Sun</i>. <a href="/wiki/Melbourne" title="Melbourne">Melbourne</a>, Australia. 28 May 2016<span class="reference-accessdate">.          <li id="cite_note-367"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-367" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFBradford2003" class="citation web cs1">Bradford, Gillian (29 April 2003). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20131114194558/https://www.abc.net.au/foreign/stories/s843061.htm">"Interview with Sir Edmund Hillary"</a>. <i>Foreign Correspondent</i>. <a href="/wiki/Australian_Broadcasting_Corporation" title="Australian Broadcasting Corporation">ABC</a>.          <li id="cite_note-bass-368"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-bass_368-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFJames_Clash2003" class="citation web cs1">James Clash (12 November 2003). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.forbes.com/2003/11/12/cz_jc_1112sport.html">"The Adventurer: Dick Bass' Many Summits"</a>. <i>Forbes</i><span class="reference-accessdate">.            <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.travelexplorations.com/tomas-olsson-found-dead-skiing-down-from-the-north-side-of-mount-everest-ended-in-tradegy.326749-18558.html">"Tomas Olsson found dead – Skiing down from the North side of Mount Everest ended in tragedy!"</a>. <i>travelexplorations.com</i><span class="reference-accessdate">.            <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFWalt_Unsworth2000" class="citation book cs1">Walt Unsworth (2000). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=STs1loP7sfsC"><i>Everest: The Mountaineering History</i></a>.          <li id="cite_note-384"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-384" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFSano_Babu_SunuwarLakpa_Tsheri_Sherpa" class="citation web cs1">Sano Babu Sunuwar & Lakpa Tsheri Sherpa. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20150918123049/http://adventure.nationalgeographic.com/adventure/trips/bucket-list/2013/ultimate-descent/">"Ultimate Adventure Bucket List – Dream Trip: Make the Ultimate Descent"</a>. <i>National Geographic</i>. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">20 September</span> 2015</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&rft.genre=unknown&rft.jtitle=National+Geographic&rft.atitle=Ultimate+Adventure+Bucket+List+%E2%80%93+Dream+Trip%3A+Make+the+Ultimate+Descent&rft.au=Sano+Babu+Sunuwar&rft.au=Lakpa+Tsheri+Sherpa&rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fadventure.nationalgeographic.com%2Fadventure%2Ftrips%2Fbucket-list%2F2013%2Fultimate-descent%2F&rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMount+Everest" class="Z3988"></span></span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-385"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-385" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFCooper2013" class="citation web cs1">Cooper, Tarquin (28 May 2013). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.redbull.com/en/adventure/stories/1331592877474/valery-rozov-base-mount-everest">"Valery Rozov BASE Jumps From Mt Everest"</a>. <a href="/wiki/Red_Bull" title="Red Bull">Red Bull</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&rft.genre=unknown&rft.btitle=Valery+Rozov+BASE+Jumps+From+Mt+Everest&rft.pub=Red+Bull&rft.date=2013-05-28&rft.aulast=Cooper&rft.aufirst=Tarquin&rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.redbull.com%2Fen%2Fadventure%2Fstories%2F1331592877474%2Fvalery-rozov-base-mount-everest&rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMount+Everest" class="Z3988"></span></span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-natgeo1-386"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-natgeo1_386-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-natgeo1_386-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-natgeo1_386-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFCoburn2013" class="citation news cs1">Coburn, Broughton (1 May 2013). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://news.nationalgeographic.com/news/2013/13/130501-mount-everest-fight-sherpas-sahibs-world-mountain-climbing/">"Mount Everest Fight Raises Questions About Sherpas"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/National_Geographic_News" class="mw-redirect" title="National Geographic News">National Geographic News</a></i>. <a href="/wiki/National_Geographic_Society" title="National Geographic Society">National Geographic Society</a>. <a href="/wiki/National_Geographic_Partners,_LLC." class="mw-redirect" title="National Geographic Partners, LLC.">National Geographic Partners, LLC.</a><span class="reference-accessdate"> Retrieved <span class="nowrap">14 September</span> 2013</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&rft.genre=article&rft.jtitle=National+Geographic+News&rft.atitle=Mount+Everest+Fight+Raises+Questions+About+Sherpas&rft.date=2013-05-01&rft.aulast=Coburn&rft.aufirst=Broughton&rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fnews.nationalgeographic.com%2Fnews%2F2013%2F13%2F130501-mount-everest-fight-sherpas-sahibs-world-mountain-climbing%2F&rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMount+Everest" class="Z3988"></span></span> </li> 

         <li id="cite_note-387"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-387" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"><cite id="CITEREFGilbert2000" class="citation web cs1">Gilbert, Jeanne-Marie (November 2000). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.pbs.org/wgbh/nova/everest/history/rongbukmon.html">"Rongbuk Monastery"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/PBS" title="PBS">PBS</a></i><span class="reference-accessdate">.          <li id="cite_note-388"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-388" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

         <li id="cite_note-389"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-389" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

      <h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Further_reading">Further reading</span></h2> 

      <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1033289096">

      <div role="note" class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable">

       For 1924 Mount Everest expedition, see <a href="/wiki/1924_British_Mount_Everest_expedition#Bibliography" title="1924 British Mount Everest expedition">1924 British Mount Everest expedition § Bibliography</a>.

      </div> 

      <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1033289096">

      <div role="note" class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable">

       For first ascent of Mount Everest, see <a href="/wiki/1953_British_Mount_Everest_expedition#Further_reading" title="1953 British Mount Everest expedition">1953 British Mount Everest expedition § Further reading</a>.
